title: Learning Design Practical Competency Enhancement: Advanced English Reading Comprehension Curriculum Utilizing Reflective Teaching Methods

context.prior_knowledge: Upper-intermediate+ English reading proficiency and basic social studies knowledge
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can critically analyze English texts on diverse social topics and extract core content with 90% accuracy.
Learners can complete self-assessment reports on improving reading strategies through reflective journaling with 100% accuracy.
Learners can concretely propose solutions to social problems using English texts through PBL team projects.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
